job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Title: Site Reliability Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Remote role (Anywhere in the US)</strong></p><p><strong>Full-time</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong></strong>Key Skills - Cloud Deployment, Agile, Kubernetes, Opensource, Python, and Elastic Search</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Your Past Experience &amp; Future Success</strong></p><p>5 to 10 years supporting large scale, distributed installations</p><p>Experience operating service in the cloud</p><p><strong>Exposure to and experience with the following tools Ansible, Docker, Kubernetes, Python, Terraform / Terragrunt</strong></p><p>Participating in and contributing to agile methodologies and best practices</p><p>Articulate and personable with strong spoken and written language abilities.</p><p>You engender a sense of mentoring and knowledge sharing amongst your team, hence creating a synergistic learning environment.</p><p>Experience working and collaborate with a distributed SRE and Engineering team</p><p>Self-motivated and sensitive about on-time delivery</p><p><strong>Jenkins and CI/CD pipeline</strong></p><p><strong>Apache Cassandra, Apache Kafka</strong></p><p><strong>Open Source Software Development</strong></p><p><strong>ElasticSearch / OpenDistro / OpenSearch</strong></p><p><strong>HashiCorp Vault</strong></p>
